lyrics:
21 contributorstranslationstürkçelast to know lyricsverse 1
she just walked away
why didnt she tell me
and where do i go tonight
this isnt happening to me
this cant be happening to me
she didnt say a word
just walked away

chorus
you were the first to say
that we were not okay
you were the first to lie
when we were not alright
this was my first love
she was the first to go
and when she left me for you
i was the last to know

verse 2
why didnt she tell me
where to go tonight
she didnt say a word
she just walked away

chorus
you were the first to say
that we were not okay
you were the first to lie
when we were not alright
this was my first love
she was the first to go
and when she left me for you
i was the last to know

chorus
ill be the first to say
that now im okay
and for the first time

and when she leaves you for dead
youll be the last to know

that now im okay
and for the first time
